title: Wise Up
description:
Vernon Payne, Rick Sommer, and Melanie Moseley share stories about being a stranger in town, taking the Bible way too literally, and a bewildering series of sexual confusions.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Pharaoh Sanders, Vernon Payne, Rick Sommer, Metal Mountains, Melanie Moseley, Teenage Fanclub, Chris Pureka, XTC, Sharon Jones, Jeff Barr, the Dap-Kings, Kevin Allison)
